import React from "react"; import { Badge, Button, Card, Navbar, Nav, Table, Container, Row, Col, FormCheck, Form, Modal, Component, Dropdown, } from "react-bootstrap"; const Users = [ { id: 1, type: "React", question: "What is the correct command to create a new React project?", level: "Remember - Understand", selected: false, }, { id: 2, type: "React", question: "What does myReactApp refer to in the following command?", level: "Remember - Understand", selected: false, }, { id: 3, type: "React", question: "What command is used to start the React local development server?", level: "Apply", selected: false, }, { id: 4, type: "React", question: "What is the default local host port that a React development server uses?", level: "Analysis - Avaluation", selected: false, }, { id: 5, type: "React", question: "To develop and run React code, Node.js is required.", level: "Advance", selected: false, }, { id: 6, type: "React", question: "What type of element will be rendered from the following code?", level: "Advance", selected: false, }, ]; class Resource extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { List: Users, MasterChecked: false, SelectedList: [], isOpenAdd: false, isOpenDelete: false, isOpenWarning: false, NumberUser: Users.length, }; } // Select/ UnSelect Table rows onMasterCheck(e) { let tempList = this.state.List; // Check/ UnCheck All Items tempList.map((user) => (user.selected = e.target.checked)); //Update State this.setState({ MasterChecked: e.target.checked, List: tempList, SelectedList: this.state.List.filter((e) => e.selected), }); } // Update List Item's state and Master Checkbox State onItemCheck(e, item) { let tempList = this.state.List; tempList.map((user) => { if (user.id === item.id) { user.selected = e.target.checked; } return user; }); //To Control Master Checkbox State const totalItems = this.state.List.length; const totalCheckedItems = tempList.filter((e) => e.selected).length; // Update State this.setState({ MasterChecked: totalItems === totalCheckedItems, List: tempList, SelectedList: this.state.List.filter((e) => e.selected), }); } // Event to get selected rows(Optional) getSelectedRows() { this.setState({ SelectedList: this.state.List.filter((e) => e.selected), }); let len = this.state.SelectedList.length if(len === 0) this.openModalWarning() else { this.openModalDelete() } } //Handle Add question openModalAdd = () => this.setState({ isOpenAdd: true }); closeModalAdd = () => this.setState({ isOpenAdd: false }); //Handle delete question openModalDelete = () => this.setState({ isOpenDelete: true }); closeModalDelete = () => this.setState({ isOpenDelete: false }); //hanlde waring modal openModalWarning = () => this.setState({ isOpenWarning: true }); closeModalWarning = () => this.setState({ isOpenWarning: false }); render() { return ( <>
Select skill e.preventDefault()} > React e.preventDefault()} > Java e.preventDefault()} > NodeJS e.preventDefault()} > .NET
e.preventDefault()} > C# Select level e.preventDefault()} > Remember - Understand e.preventDefault()} > Apply e.preventDefault()} > Analysis - Avaluation e.preventDefault()} > Creation

 {/* warning */} Waring YOU DO NOT CHOOSE ANY QUESTION!!! ); } } export default Resource;
